description: Complete system overview documenting the youth residential care management system architecture, key components, and integration points between behavioral, academic, and clinical subsystems
Detailed documentation of the behavioral scoring system including point calculations, level progression rules, risk assessment algorithms, and the AI-enhanced behavioral analysis system
Comprehensive documentation of youth profile data models, behavioral tracking schemas, academic progress structures, and relationships between different data entities in the system
Technical specification of the AI-enhanced report generation system including DPN reports, court reports, progress evaluations, and clinical documentation algorithms
Detailed documentation of assessment workflows including Real Colors personality assessment, risk level calculations, comprehensive placement assessment, and quick ISP assessment systems
